sentences.sentence: When I told him I had no fancy dress for the costume of a toreador for me just like a rabbit out of a hat.
sentences.translation: 当我告诉他，我没有参加舞会的化装服饰，他像变戏法似的给我拿出一件西班牙斗牛士款式的服装。

sentences.sentence: Once or twice he rearranged the light waterproof which he had slung over one shoulder in toreador fashion.
sentences.translation: 他以斗牛士的气派，把浅色雨衣甩在一个肩膀上，偶而整理一下。
